sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
sec.p: In this study, the intestinal samples were collected after the death of pigs due to the virus infection in the pig farms. No pig was culled for sampling purpose in this study

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
